title: New: Them 9’s – Drunk
content:
Image: Scott Leonard

Australia showcasing yet again why it’s the most exciting place on the planet for new music at this moment in time.

Them 9’s, pals of CitR favourites Bel Air, have revamped their line-up, and their sound, pulling down all previous traces of the band, and starting afresh with blistering new single Drunk. Lamenting lost loves and the ease of turning to the bottle, it’s four minutes of thrillingly addictive indie-pop, complete with epic, rousing guitar lines, touching upon, dare I say it, Kings of Leon territory at points. Check out Drunk below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
